```{r setup, include = FALSE}
l <- readRDS("data/lagrange.Rds")
model_list <- readr::read_rds("model_list.Rds")
```

```{r echo = FALSE}
l$p.value <- as.character(signif(l$p.value))
knitr::kable(l)
```

RENAME RHO IN MODEL
```{r echo = FALSE, eval=T}
texreg::texreg(
  model_list,
  single.row = T,
  booktabs = T,
  dcolumn = T, custom.model.names = c("MHLTH", "DEPRESSION", "SLEEP"),
  custom.coef.map = list(
    "(Intercept)" = NA,
    "$\\rho\\\\$" = "\\\\$\\rho\\\\$",
    "NDVI_MEAN" = "Mean NDVI",
    "greenspace_n" = "Greenspace Area",
    "pct_white" = "Percent White",
    "pct_125k" = "Income",
    "amens_per" = "Amenities",
    "trail_per_area" = "Trails"

  ),float.pos = "h"
)

```
